chance1.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :piece item 0 fromplayer curplayer "piece
        movepiece :piece :game_go
        make :moneyid getid item 0 fromplayer curplayer "money
        make :money fromgame :moneyid
        make :money + :money 200
        setfromid :moneyid :money
        updatemoney
    ]

chance2.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :piece item 0 fromplayer curplayer "piece
        movepiece :piece :game_boardwalk
    ]

chance3.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :piece item 0 fromplayer curplayer "piece
        movepiece :piece :game_illinois
    ]

chance4.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :piece item 0 fromplayer curplayer "piece
        for [ :i 0 40 ] [
            make :dz objdz :piece
            make :next dzfollow :dz [ "Forward ]
            movepiece :piece :next
            if == getid :next "stcharles [ break ]
            if == getid :next "go [ 
                make :moneyid getid item 0 fromplayer curplayer "money
                make :money fromgame :moneyid
                make :money + :money 200
                setfromid :moneyid :money
                updatemoney
            ]
        ]
        movepiece :piece :game_illinois
    ]

chance5.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :piece item 0 fromplayer curplayer "piece
        for [ :i 0 40 ] [
            make :dz objdz :piece
            make :next dzfollow :dz [ "Forward ]
            movepiece :piece :next
            if == getid :next "readingRR [ break ]
            if == getid :next "go [ 
                make :moneyid getid item 0 fromplayer curplayer "money
                make :money fromgame :moneyid
                make :money + :money 200
                setfromid :moneyid :money
                updatemoney
            ]
        ]
        movepiece :piece :game_illinois
    ]

chance6.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :piece item 0 fromplayer curplayer "piece
        for [ :i 0 40 ] [
            make :dz objdz :piece
            make :next dzfollow :dz [ "Forward ]
            movepiece :piece :next
            if hasclass :next "railroad [ break ]
            if == getid :next "go [ 
                make :moneyid getid item 0 fromplayer curplayer "money
                make :money fromgame :moneyid
                make :money + :money 200
                setfromid :moneyid :money
                updatemoney
            ]
        ]
    ]

chance8.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :piece item 0 fromplayer curplayer "piece
        repeat 3 [
            make :dz objdz :piece
            make :next dzfollow :dz [ "Backward ]
            movepiece :piece :next
        ]
    ]

chance9.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :moneyid getid item 0 fromplayer curplayer "money
        make :money fromgame :moneyid
        make :money + :money 50
        setfromid :moneyid :money
        updatemoney
    ]

chance10.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :moneyid getid item 0 fromplayer curplayer "money
        make :money fromgame :moneyid
        make :money + :money 150
        setfromid :moneyid :money
        updatemoney
    ]

chance11.action:
to action [ ] [
        for [ :i 0 :game_playerCount ] [
            make :moneyid getid item 0 fromplayer getplayer :i "money
            make :money fromgame :moneyid
            make :money + :money 50
            setfromid :moneyid :money
            
            make :moneyid getid item 0 curplayer "money
            make :money fromgame :moneyid
            make :money - :money 50
            setfromid :moneyid :money
        ]
        make :moneyid getid item 0 curplayer "money
        make :money fromgame :moneyid
        make :money - :money 50
        setfromid :moneyid :money
        updatemoney
    ]

chance14.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :piece item 0 fromplayer curplayer "piece
        movepiece :piece :game_jail
    ]

chance15.action:
to action [ ] [
        make :card item 0 fromgameclass "chance15
        make :inventory item 0 fromplayer curplayer "inventory
        movepiece :card :inventory
    ]
